Subroutine cce

696 : 
697 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
698 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
699 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
700 : 
701 :       subroutine cce (objfun, invar)
702 :       use sce_mod
703 :       implicit none
704 : 
705 : !     * Declarations
706 :       REAL*8, DIMENSION(mopt),      INTENT(inout) :: objfun
707 :       REAL*8, DIMENSION(npar,mopt), INTENT(inout) :: invar
708 : 
709 : !     * Definitions
710 :       INTEGER :: i_, j_, nsel, rannum, l
711 : 
712 : !     * SELECT PARENTS
713 : 
714 :       do l = 1, mopt
715 :         selected(:) = .false.
716 :         nsel = 0
717 :         do while (nsel .ne. qopt)
718 :           call random_number(ranscal)             ! SCALAR RANDOM NUMBER
719 :           rannum = ceiling((2.d0 * mopt + 1.d0 - sqrt(4.d0 * mopt      &
720 :      &           * (mopt + 1.d0) * (1.d0 - ranscal) + 1.d0)) * 0.5d0)
721 : 
722 : !         * NOTE: A SIMPLER ALTERNATIVE TO THE ABOVE LINE IS (19.03.2004):
723 : 
724 :           if (rannum .ge. 1 .and. rannum .le. mopt) then
725 :             if (.not. selected(rannum)) then
726 :               selected(rannum) = .true.
727 :               nsel = nsel + 1
728 :             endif
729 :           endif
730 :         enddo
731 :         nsel = 0
732 :         i_ = 0
733 :         do while (nsel .ne. qopt)
734 :           i_ = i_ + 1
735 :           if (selected(i_)) then
736 :             nsel = nsel + 1
737 :             parentsid(nsel) = i_
738 :           endif
739 :         enddo
740 : 
741 : !       * GENERATE OFFSPRING AND SORT THE RESULTING COMPLEX
742 : 
743 :         objfunsub(:) = objfun(parentsid(:))
744 :         invarsub(:,:) = invar(:, parentsid(:))
745 :         do j_ = 1, alpha
746 :           call simplex(invarsub(:,:), objfunsub(:))
747 :         enddo
748 :         objfun(parentsid(:)) = objfunsub(:)
749 :         invar(:, parentsid(:)) = invarsub(:,:)
750 :         call sortcomp(invar, shape(invar), objfun, size(objfun))
751 :       enddo
752 : 
753 :       return
754 :       end subroutine cce
